Package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.annotations

Annotation Interface DbHook

@Repeatable(DbHooks.class) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) public @interface DbHook
Defines a database hook to run before or after all tests in a class.

Annotate a test class with one or more @DbHook to execute custom database logic (via DbHookFlow) at the specified lifecycle phase. Hooks with the same timing are ordered by order().

  • Element Details

    • when

      io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.hooks.HookExecution when
      When to execute this database hook relative to the test lifecycle.
      Returns:
      {

    • type

      String type
      The identifier of the hook implementation to invoke.

      This value is passed into ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(java.lang.Class<T>, java.lang.String, java.lang.String...) to locate the DbHookFlow enum.

      Returns:
      the hook type name

    • arguments

      String[] arguments
      Optional string arguments to pass to the hook logic.
      Returns:
      an array of argument strings
      Default:
      {}

    • order

      int order
      Order of execution among hooks with the same timing. Lower values execute earlier.
      Returns:
      the execution order
      Default:
      0
